product_name: BeautyBioThe Balance pH Balancing Gel Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsThe Balance pH Balancing Gel Cleanser from BeautyBio is designed to gently balance skin's pH to a healthy, ideal 5.5 without stripping skin's protective acid mantle.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsGinger Root Extract: Improves skin structure, promotes circulation and helps soothe inflamed skinOat Kernel Extract: Packed with vitamins B and D, the oat extract increases skin cell metabolism and helps get rid of redness on the faceBisabolol: Improves skin's suppleness, stimulates the natural healing process, and fortifies skin against everyday damage and agingCitric Acid: Boosts collagen production and diminishes the appearance of dark spots and age spotsFormulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesSulfatesFormaldehydeTriclosanHydroquinoneTriclocarbanOxybenzoneItem 2572415How To UseUse AM and PM. Gently massage with a washcloth to help stimulate micro-circulation and micro-exfoliation.Precautions: Avoid direct eye contact.IngredientsWater/aqua/eau, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Glycerin, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Xanthan Gum, Avena Sativa (oat) Kernel Extract, Zingiber Officinale (ginger) Root Extract, Bisabolol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Lauroamphoacetate, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Fragrance/parfum, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Benzyl Benzoate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use AM and PM. Gently massage with a washcloth to help stimulate micro-circulation and micro-exfoliation.Precautions: Avoid direct eye contact.

reviews.headline: Good cleanser
reviews.comments:
Light, gentle and adequately foamy. Doesn't leave an oily residue but also doesn't dry out my skin. I say this as someone who has purchased 3 separate times and in the past bought whatever is on sale from the grocery store. 

Don't even get me started about their moisturizers and serums!!!

reviews.headline: A must have skin care staple!
reviews.comments: The best cleanser I've had in years. Gentke, effective and unscented. You need a pea size amount to clean your face. It will last a long time!

reviews.headline: Favorite cleanser
reviews.comments: Love this cleanser so much!! Cleared my skin so quickly!

reviews.headline: A staple in my skincare routine.
reviews.comments: I love this cleaser down! My skin has been its best state since using this cleanser and it pairs well with all of my moisturizers and skin care products.

reviews.headline: OMG
reviews.comments: I have used pretty much every cleanser on the market in my life. For the past couple years I was using cosRX snail mucin cleanser and it was the only way I could not break out in my strict regimen. I tried this on a whim suggestion feom the aethethician in the herald square ulta- LIFE CHANGING. My skin I thought was good before. Two weeks in and I am glowing, getting compliments from people just meeting me on my skin. I didnt change anything else and I can not say how amazing this is. My skin texture went from being like the palm of the hand to the backs of my knees.

reviews.headline: Soft subtle skin
reviews.comments: Beautiful hydrating cleanser. Doesn't strip the acidic barrier,  ph balancing,  calming, restorative. Everything my skin has been needing.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I love this cleanser! I am so grateful to Ellie from Ulta Baybrook! I was looking lost and she approached me, listened and led  me to this cleanser! I love it it leaves my tired skin feeling clean, refreshed, dewy… sooo… hooray!!! Thanks so much Ellie!!!

reviews.headline: Terrible
reviews.comments: Waste of money. Not worth it.

reviews.headline: ❤️ In love!
reviews.comments:
I have tried just about every line of face products ranging from Dr. P....... TO ESTEE ....
 THIS WHOLE LINE is absolutely amazing! It's lightweight, very hydrating and immediately invigorates your skin. This is one product line you don't have to use for months to see the difference in your skin! It's almost instantaneous! I highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Fragrance is horrible!
reviews.comments: I do not recommend. There is a lot of fragrance and I should have read the ingredient list to know that. I was persuaded to buy the product from an employee who should have known not to recommend a product with fragrance as we know it is not good for acne prone skin. Not to mention she knew I had acne prone and dry skin two things that are horrible with fragrance. Also the fragrance was not talked about only the fact that it will help you with the "PH" but t lets be honest it is not a great option for anyone! SO mad that an employee tried to convince me to buy it too. Also, the bottle in the store had the new packaging and the one I was convinced to buy had old packaging covered with the new one. hint hint they the store clerks are trying to get rid of product... thats unacceptable too!!

reviews.headline: My daily cleanser for two years now
reviews.comments: My skin feels great. I use this twice a day. Even when I tried to switch to other cheaper products, I noticed the difference and went back. Worth the money!

reviews.headline: Let's make this product a highly recognized cleanser!
reviews.comments:
I love how the pH balancing makes my skin feel. I'm baffled that this product is not better known. When I visited a second Ulta to restock -- the staff was unaware of this product. I've shared this product with family and friends.

I'm 62 years old and have been serious about my skin since the mid-70s. I've noticed that skin holds moisture much longer since I started using this product!

reviews.headline: Highly overrated for price especially
reviews.comments: I've been using this product for a month now & see absolutely no difference in my skin. The price especially for the quality isn't worth it. I feel so stupid for being scammed into buying this hoping for better results in my skin. It's not worth it.

reviews.headline: so good for hormonal acne
reviews.comments: I've never written a review for any skincare product, but this product has seriously cleared up my hormonal acne so much! I absolutely love it!

reviews.headline: Really bad smell
reviews.comments: I had tried the travel size in this and thought it was more of a peppermint smell. I couldn't keep the full size more than a day I think the oat extract is giving the smell it has.. worse than like a bad cleaning solution. I will stick to indie lee with the strawberry or peach & lily ! Sorry :(

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I like how it has changed my skin tone back to it's original.

reviews.headline: The best!
reviews.comments: I LOVE this cleanser!

reviews.headline: I am a loyal believer in this product
reviews.comments: Let me be very clear, I never write reviews but this product really is worth the money!! I want to say that if you really do suffer from acne but don't want to deal with that harsh burning from tea tree oil Get. This. Product!!! Went from bumpy skin to baby smooth soft skins. It really tightens your pores.

reviews.headline: Great Cleanser
reviews.comments: Better than I expected.  My face feels and look better than before.  It does have a bit of a chemical smell to it but made my skin flawless and doesn't dry it out.

reviews.headline: Great for oily and acne prone skin
reviews.comments: I've been using this for about a month now and I really like it! I went in looking for something to help my acne, oily prone skin and an employee recommended this. It's helped with my oily forehead and cystic acne around my chin!

properties.name: Pros

values.label: Healed my Eczema overnight! Best Cleanser Ever!

display_values: Healed my Eczema overnight! Best Cleanser Ever!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I honestly have no idea what is in this magic cleanser, but it cleans deep down into my skin and even removes makeup like heavy mascara, Smokey Eyes, lipliner, and foundation. 

I expected after seeing the videos that it would remove light makeup but this is a SERIOUS cleanser that removes everything and amazingly enough is actually EXTREMELY sensitive on your skin. Plus it leaves my skin feeling so clean and I don't use anything but my hands. I'm amazed every time I use it because I use white towels in the master bathroom and no residue is left. I LOVE THIS CLEANSER, it's the only the only one that does everything and doesn't cause any redness. My skin is so sensitive even typical makeup removers and other high end cleansers usually leave my face red. But this is the first one that takes everything off and causes no redness. 
You also only need to use a dime size amount for it lather up and clean your face and neck. One bottle has lasted me over 3 months.
faceoff_positive.headline: BEST CLEANSER I HAVE EVER USED...will never use anything ...

faceoff_negative.comments: I do not recommend. There is a lot of fragrance and I should have read the ingredient list to know that. I was persuaded to buy the product from an employee who should have known not to recommend a product with fragrance as we know it is not good for acne prone skin. Not to mention she knew I had acne prone and dry skin two things that are horrible with fragrance. Also the fragrance was not talked about only the fact that it will help you with the "PH" but t lets be honest it is not a great option for anyone! SO mad that an employee tried to convince me to buy it too. Also, the bottle in the store had the new packaging and the one I was convinced to buy had old packaging covered with the new one. hint hint they the store clerks are trying to get rid of product... thats unacceptable too!!
faceoff_negative.headline: Fragrance is horrible!

rollup.name: The Balance pH Balancing Gel Cleanser
